thread.title: Baylor WBB Adds a Record Nine TV Telecasts
thread.title_full: Baylor WBB Adds a Record Nine TV Telecasts

author: Nick Canizales
title: Baylor WBB Adds a Record Nine TV Telecasts
text:
Addition brings total number of appearances to 17. Baylor WBB Adds a Record Nine TV Telecasts Posted: ncanizales@kcentv.com 
WACO, Texas – As part of its largest third tier television package in program history, Baylor women’s basketball has added nine televised home games, bringing the team’s 2015-16 season total to 17 broadcasts. More games may be added later as opponents announce third tier telecasts. 
For the second straight season, all of BU’s Big 12 Conference home games will be televised and Baylor’s nine third tier games are also a program record. 
Five Baylor home games will be broadcast on FOX Sports Southwest Plus (FSSW+), three on FOX Sports Southwest (FSSW) and one on Fox College Sports (FCS). Including the Big 12 Conference’s television package with FOX Sports, the Lady Bears will appear on the FOX family of networks 15 times and will make two ESPN2 appearances. 
Baylor’s first third tier televised game of the 2015-16 season will be on Nov. 13 as the Lady Bears host UT Arlington in the opening round of the Preseason WNIT on FSSW+ at 6 p.m. On Dec. 2 at 6 p.m., Baylor will take on Rice on FSSW+ followed by a Dec. 17 contest vs. Oral Roberts on FCS at 7 p.m. On Jan. 12 and Jan. 27th, West Virginia (7 p.m.) and Texas Tech (7 p.m.) games will be broadcast on FSSW+ and FSSW, respectively. Four broadcasts complete BU’s third tier programming as Baylor hosts Kansas State (Feb. 3, 7 p.m., FSSW+), Kansas (Feb. 6, 2 p.m., FSSW), Oklahoma State (Feb. 17, 7 p.m., FSSW) and Iowa State (Feb. 20, 2 p.m., FSSW+). 
Baylor’s 2015-16 Televised Contests 
Nov. 13 – UT Arlington – 6 p.m. (FSSW Plus)* 
Dec. 2 – Rice – 6 p.m. (FSSW Plus)* 
Dec. 17 – Oral Roberts – 7 p.m. (FCS)* 
Jan. 3 – Oklahoma – 3:30 p.m. (FS1) 
Jan. 9 – TCU – 11 a.m. (FSN) 
Jan. 12 – West Virginia – 7 p.m. (FSSW Plus)* 
Jan. 17 – at Texas – 2 p.m. (ESPN2) 
Jan. 23 – at Iowa State – 12:30 p.m. (FS1) 
Jan. 27 –Texas Tech – 7 p.m. (FSSW)* 
Jan. 30 – at West Virginia – 3 p.m. (FSN) 
Feb. 3 – Kansas State – 7 p.m. (FSSW Plus)* 
Feb. 6 – Kansas – 2 p.m. (FSSW)* 
Feb. 17 – Oklahoma State – 7 p.m. (FSSW)* 
Feb. 20 – Iowa State – 2 p.m. (FSSW Plus)* 
Feb. 22 – at Oklahoma – 8 p.m. (ESPN2) 
Feb. 27 – at Kansas State – 3:30 p.m. (FS2) 
Feb. 29 – Texas – 8 p.m. (FS1) 
* Baylor third tier broadcast 
FSSW + – FOX Sports Southwest Plus 
FS1 – FOX Sports 1
